changeSet.author: typography
changeSet.createView: select o.ID ORDER_ID, o.AMOUNT AMOUNT, o.ORDERS_DATE ORDER_DATE, o.ORDERS_DEADLINE ORDER_DEADLINE, o.STATUS STATUS, o.CONFIRMED CONFIRMED, o.SUPPLIED SUPPLIED, oswciv.ORDER_SUBJECT_ID ORDER_SUBJECT_ID, oswciv.ORDER_SUBJECT_NAME ORDER_SUBJECT_NAME, oswciv.CONSUMABLE_ITEMS_ID CONSUMABLE_ITEM_ID, oswciv.CONSUMABLE_ITEMS_ITEM CONSUMABLE_ITEM_ITEM, oswciv.USER_ID USER_ID, oc.QUANTITY QUANTITY, oc.id ORDERS_CONSUMABLES_ID from ORDERS o inner join (ORDER_SUBJECTS os left join ORDER_SUBJECT_WITH_CONSUMABLE_ITEMS_VIEW oswciv on os.ID = oswciv.ORDER_SUBJECT_ID) on o.ORDER_SUBJECTS_ID = os.ID left join ORDERS_CONSUMABLES oc on o.id = oc.order_id and oswciv.consumable_items_id = oc.consumable_item_id
